name: Sasquatch Sammies
description: It's no surprise, Big Foot is old and he's losing the hair that once made him so handsome. We're raising money by selling our special line of 'Sasquatch Sammies' sandwiches, to fund experimental surgery so he can get hair plugs. Let's get Big Foot his confidence back.

name: Beware, The Beholder
description: He's got a bunch of eyes, and is a bit scary. Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and this guy lost a few of those eyes. These hospital bills aren't cheap wherever he's from.

name: Awaken The Kraken
description: This sea monster of giant proportions has been sited near Norway. We are lacking the funds to prepare the ancient ritual to summon such a powerful beast. The good news is that, thanks to this wonderful app we can finally release the Kraken!
